plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be adventure, as all of the books listed have elements of adventure in them. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be mystery, as two of the books listed are mysteries. The user's favourite setting is likely to be a fictional one, as all of the books listed have fictional settings. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be descriptive, as all of the books listed have detailed descriptions of settings, characters, and actions. The user's favourite length is likely to be novel-length, as all of the books listed are novels. The user's favourite topic is likely to be coming-of-age, as two of the books listed deal with this topic. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be fast-paced, as all of the books listed have quick-moving plots. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be third-person omniscient, as all of the books listed are written in this point of view. The user's favourite themes are likely to be social commentary and self-discovery, as all of the books listed deal with these themes.
